ygData.subject: Stupid question, random search comparison condition
ygData.msgSnippet: Perhaps I m far too tired to think this through clearly. I was thinking of adding a random search implementation to my NEAT experiment for simple comparison

Perhaps I'm far too tired to think this through clearly. 

I was thinking o=
f adding a "random search" implementation to my NEAT experiment for simple =
comparison purposes, and I've got brain lock on what the best way to do thi=
s would be. 

Provide identical fitness values to all genomes each generati=
on (all get a fitness of 1.0 or the like)? 

Or randomly pick fitness value=
s?


-Drew
